title: Role Priority
changes: Roles now have a priority. low priority roles cannot modify the higher priority roles.

title: Verified Servers
new: Servers that are verified now have a checkmark.

title: Block Users
changes: Clicking on a friend in friends list or clicking on a setting option should now close the drawer on mobile.
new: Open server context menu from the drawer header.

title: Block Users
new: You can now block users from the profile popout. Blocking the users will prevent them from interacting to you.

title: Server Invite Page
fixes: Fixed some bugs throughout the code.

title: Fixes And Changes
changes: Invite links should now use MainAppURL
fixes: You can now scroll through the server channels list.

title: Desktop App Badge
new: Notifications will now show a red badge for the electron app.

title: Edit Bot Commands
new: You can now edit bot commands in the manage bots page in settings.

title: Come Back! :(
new: You can now unban members from a server through the server settings page.
Right clicking on a mentioned user should now display a context menu.

title: Fixed Bug
fixes: Clicking on a user in manage users would take you to an incorrect user.

title: Common Servers & Friends
new: You can now see common servers and common friends in the profile popout.
changes: Changed version numbering to be semantic
Slightly changed the way how updates are checked and displayed.

title: Video Embed
new: Uploaded MP4 videos and YouTube URL links now show an embed inside Nertivia.

title: Bots
new: You can now create & invite bots.

title: Close DM Channels
new: You can now close DM channels

title: Google Drive Link
new: Added link with Google Drive popout

title: Small Changes
new: Added electron title bar WIP. You won't be able to see it yet though as the electron app is not released yet.
changes: Removed border radius from left side header.

title: Delete Server
new: You can now delete your server through server settings.
changes: Made changes to the changelog header.

title: Create Server Bug Fix
fixes: Creating a server would throw errors.

title: Small Changes
changes: Popouts with buttons now use the custom button template.

title: Changelog
new: Added a changelog GUI which will be shown automatically. You can also view the changelog through the settings page.
changes: Changed border radius in some places.

title: Update Checker
new: Added a changelog. Will hopefully make a GUI for it next.
Added an update checker. Nertivia will check for updates every hour when interacting.
